1.0.name: wordpress/related-documents-widget
1.0.description:
Creates a widget that displays attached media that can be added to the sidebar.

The widget options include:

  1. Determine wether links will open in a new window
  2. Omit images from being displayed in the output
  3. Provide a list of pages to exclude from the output
  4. Use a specific widget title (i.e. Related Documents)
